item.title: Last Breath Trailer: Simu Liu Is Stranded On The Ocean Floor In Heart-Pounding Survival Thriller
item.description: The first official trailer for Last Breath reveals MCU star Simu Liu stranded on the ocean floor in a heart-pounding survival thriller.

item.title: Shocking Brian O’Conner Stat Reveals A Harsh Reality About The Fast & Furious Franchise
item.description: Fast & Furious may be one of the most successful movie franchises of all time, but a shocking Brian O'Conner stat unveils a harsh truth.

item.title: The New Lord Of The Rings Movie Reveals Its Opening Scene In Epic 8 Minute Video
item.description: The first 8 minutes of The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim have been released, teasing an epic return to Peter Jackson’s Middle-earth.
